title: I deserve to be in Bronze

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body: TBH Bronze is legitimately hard / damn near impossible to get placed into if you have basic game knowledge and mechanics.

> [{quoted}](name=Demon Incarnate,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=z0iq3FHE,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-11-09T23:37:33.561+0000)
>
> TBH your wrong

Mate I've literally played on my other account when i was on tilt and still managed not to get bronze it's quite simple if you have  basic game knowledge and mechanics.

since you know so much about mechanics and you know that new accounts can have a higher mmr or elo than other people in bronze right? which effects your match making..... right?

Obviously not or else why would you make that comment.
Answer me this smart ass. Are there leavers in LoL?

twin shadows on vlad.......i honestly dont know what to think. the cdr is good at least but.....twin shadows.....

if you've been playing since season 1 and been bronze ever since how do you explain people who've gotten to diamond/master/challenger in probably less than half the time you've spent playing?

jk its all luck. oce is the worst server in the world, 40% bronze, highest percentage, theres a 1/22 tp twitch in every single game. you've had the worst luck and im sorry for you. godspeed for you and your twin shadows vlad sir

one thing is though. 3 teammates, 4 wards, 38 minutes.....thats not good enough. no excuses for not getting wards in that long a time. a 19/5 vlad couldve gotten sightstone and gone around pissing on every enemy turret he wanted to and brawled anyone that tried to stop him

Bro twin shadows is probably one of my favorite items for ap mid.

Puts on 70's salesmen tv voice

Ready to kill mid? but afraid of enemy jungle ruining your day?
Worry no more, with twin shadow you can send out heat seeking ghost that will find any chap lurking around so you can feel confident that when u want to kill you mark, ur alone to do so!!!

Cant get close enough to land your pokes?
Well with this item you get extra movement speed. allowing you to get in and get out quicker than ever before.

But wait there is more

It gives you CD And AP!!! what more can you ask for on a CD AP champ?

But wait there is still more

No one has placed ward and your doing dragon  .... GHOST
Barron .... GHOST
In jungle by yourself and you get the felling.... GHOST
Been chased... GHOST
Want to catch up to a enemy? .... GHOST

So many uses, because it not just a item. Its probably one of the most op skills in the game.

Heat seeking, slowing, vision, and it gives you all the perks of the item.

Out standing
You placed one ward all game? Dang, bronze games are scary.
who needs wards when i have ghosts
Because 2 games where you did average is proof you shouldn't be in bronze...
Nice first blood on Viktor man. Although, that game i played with you, holy hell. We carried bot, as you said an AFK and a feeder. -_- Had fun though :p

I think people are missing the real point of this post.

Its not about me been good. 
Its about the fact that Elo hell does exist and LoL is still using a ranking system that doesn't work for solo que players

The fact that no matter how hard I "try" to carry nothing can stop  the constant Leavers/Afk's & Intentional Feeders that you get in Bronze Hell

People say that Elo Hell is not a place, and people in bronze deserve to be there. 
What I'm saying is those people are dead wrong
I've said it before and ill say it again

Any ranked system that punishes you for the actions of another ally player or any element you have NO CONTROL over except enemy performance  is not only unfair, but makes any competitive aspect irrelevant. 

Its the simple fact that its says "solo que" not "team que" In solo que you should be ranked on your own individual performance and not held accountable for leavers/afks, troll and feeders and the likes.

People bragging about what rank they are is a joke, the only reason your there and i'm here is luck. pure and simple.
Luck that you didn't have 95% leavers in your games.
Luck that every time you get a promo you didn't get a troll or leaver

_**Yes obviously skill level is involved don't get me wrong, but you cant deny the fact that the above factors could and can contribute to someones ranking experience. As such different levels of these factors can and do occur. 
Some people will get more leavers in their games, some less. If the prior is possible it must also be possible that it could get so bad that it gets to the stage your lumped with the people that cause the problem due to a win loss ranking system. Even though you yourself are not a leaver or troll and have "average" skill which should at least land you a place in silver or gold. Been lumped with the people that are leavers and afk's will result in a never ending cycle of games with leavers and trolls. Resulting in a "ELO HELL"  **_

If you repute this in my opinion your not only arrogant but have no grasp of reality also making you mentally deranged
